title: Ariat Men's Rebar M5 Straight Durastretch Edge Straight Leg Jean
description: STACKABLE STRAIGHT JEAN: Designed with sophistication, these straight leg jeans for men are crafted to be relaxed through the waist, hip, and thigh for a perfect, comfortable fit every day. The straight leg fit with the stackable design creates a perfect over-the-boot silhouette.

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made for ultimate comfort, this slim jean is combined with the proven flame-resistant technology. Showcasing quality craftsmanship and a fashionable appeal, this jean is perfect for wearing to hazardous work environments as well as a casual day out with buddies.

PREMIUM FEATURES: This men's slim straight jean has no-rub comfort inseams that prevent irritation despite wearing it for long extended work hours. The extra-deep front pockets, anchored belt loops, coin pocket, and heavy-duty zippers and hardware complete its look.

GREAT GIFT FOR MEN: Now grab the perfect gift for your husband or boyfriend on any special occasion with this country boot cut jeans. Ideal for work, outdoors, or a night out, these jeans can be worn with anything and everything in his closet.

SCIENCE OF INNOVATION: Ariat excels in advanced technologies to deliver products that outperform in various conditions. Partnering with world-class biomechanical research groups and testing labs, Ariat strives to improve performance, comfort, and durability.

Rebar Jeans are built to last. With twice the durability thanks to the ToughMax denim and Durastretch for maximum flexibility, these jeans are low rise and slim through the waist, hip and thigh. The stackable, straight leg design allows you to easily slip these men's work jeans over your boots and the dark wash is sophisticated and rugged. Perfect for work on a construction site or on the farm, you won't be disappointed with the men's Rebar M4 Low Rise jeans with Durastretch.No matter what you need, there’s an Ariat product made for you. Ariat works with global suppliers to develop new material that is lighter, cooler and more durable than anything else in the market. Every product, from hiking and work boots to western casual wear and English riding gear, gets field tested with people like you, enabling us to consistently raise the bar for functionality and style.Ariat is committed to building a different breed of company, one that reflects our core values as a team and those of our consumers. Our company values have shaped our success since 1993 ― a commitment to innovation, quality, integrity, teamwork and respect.
